instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3536: What is 820-3536? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-3635: What is 820-3635? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (Fan spin)
threads.message:
Have a Macbook pro retina <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3635</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-05

[B]Issue: [/B]
- Fan runs high
- keyboard spacebar doesn't work

[B]troubleshoot:[/B]
[LIST=1]
[*]Have checked all current sense, everything seems fine.
[*]Also, checked around the Fan connector, it seems fine also.
[*]Changed the SMC from a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  [B]Could this be the issue? [/B]
[/LIST]

What could be the issue?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (Fan spin)
threads.message:
"Changed the SMC from a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  [B]Could this be the issue?[/B]"
Very likely...
3476 SMC should work instead.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (Fan spin)
threads.message:
[USER=682]@2informaticos[/USER] 

Thanks Master.. I switched the SMC and now the fan stopped running. Although I don't think this SMC is working properly, so I place an order for more new ones. Once I have them I will revert back to this thread. Im sure though it will work once I have the new one in.

Many thanks once again. Always amazing support here on this forum.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (Fan spin)
threads.message: I hope you didn't order real "NEW" SMC chip; it MUST come from donor board...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (Fan spin)
threads.message: Yes, ordered from Donor boards... always... Thanks, [USER=682]@2informaticos[/USER] for the heads-up. Much Appreciated...
